languages.text: "Ксенос Муаран вывел свой отряд из лесов и готовится войти в оскверненный сектор. Он просит о помощи и обещает, что "потом" мы поймем, что происходит. Не ясно, можно ли доверять столь скрытному существу".

"The xenos Muaran has taken his squad out of the forest and is making ready to enter the corrupted sector. He requests aid and promises that we will understand what is going on 'soon.' It is not clear whether we can trust such an enigmatic creature."
languages.original_text: "Ксенос Муаран вывел свой отряд из лесов и готовится войти в оскверненный сектор. Он просит о помощи и обещает, что "потом" мы поймем, что происходит. Не ясно, можно ли доверять столь скрытному существу".

traits.locale_text: "Xenos Muaran had taken his squad out of the forest and id getting ready to enter the desecrated sector. He requests help and promises that we will understand what is going on 'soon'. It is not clear whether we can trust such a secretive creature."

"The xenos Muaran has taken his squad out of the forest and is making ready to enter the corrupted sector. He requests aid and promises that we will understand what is going on 'soon.' It is not clear whether we can trust such an enigmatic creature."

languages.text: “异形穆兰已经带着他的小队离开森林，准备进入腐化区域。他请求援助，承诺我们将‘很快’了解目前发生的事情。我们目前还不清楚能不能相信这个神秘莫测的异形。”
languages.original_text: "The xenos Muaran has taken his squad out of the forest and is making ready to enter the corrupted sector. He requests aid and promises that we will understand what is going on 'soon.' It is not clear whether we can trust such an enigmatic creature."

traits.locale_text: “异形穆兰已经带着他的小队离开森林，准备进入腐化区域。他请求援助，承诺我们将‘很快’了解目前发生的事情。我们目前还不清楚能不能相信这个神秘莫测的异形。”
“异形穆兰已经带着他的小队离开森林，准备进入亵渎区域。他请求援助，承诺我们将‘很快’了解目前发生的事情。我们目前还不清楚能不能相信这个神秘莫测的异形。”

languages.text: «El xenos Muaran ha sacado a su escuadrón del bosque y se prepara para entrar en el sector corrupto. Solicita ayuda y promete que "pronto" entenderemos lo que está pasando. No está claro si podemos confiar en una criatura tan enigmática».
languages.original_text: "The xenos Muaran has taken his squad out of the forest and is making ready to enter the corrupted sector. He requests aid and promises that we will understand what is going on 'soon.' It is not clear whether we can trust such an enigmatic creature."

traits.locale_text: «El xenos Muaran ha sacado a su escuadrón del bosque y se prepara para entrar en el sector corrupto. Solicita ayuda y promete que "pronto" entenderemos lo que está pasando. No está claro si podemos confiar en una criatura tan enigmática».

languages.text: 「ゼノのムアランは分隊を森から連れ出し、汚されたセクターに進入する準備をしています。彼は援助を要請し、我々が'直ちに'何が起こっているのかを理解できるようになると約束してくれた。このような得体の知れない生物を信用していいのかどうかは、よく分かりません」
languages.original_text: "The xenos Muaran has taken his squad out of the forest and is making ready to enter the corrupted sector. He requests aid and promises that we will understand what is going on 'soon.' It is not clear whether we can trust such an enigmatic creature."

traits.locale_text: 「ゼノのムアランは分隊を森から連れ出し、冒涜されたセクターに進入する準備をしています。彼は援助を要請し、我々が'直ちに'何が起こっているのかを理解できるようになると約束してくれた。このような得体の知れない生物を信用していいのかどうかは、よく分かりません」
「ゼノのムアランは分隊を森から連れ出し、冒涜されたセクターに進入する準備をしています。彼は援助を要請し、我々が'直ちに'何が起こっているのかを理解できるようになると約束してくれた。このような得体の知れない生物を信用していいのかどうかは、よく分かりません」

languages.text: « Le xénos Muaran et son escouade ont quitté la forêt et se préparent à pénétrer dans le secteur corrompu. Il a demandé qu'on leur envoie de l'aide et a promis que la nature des événements nous apparaîtrait clairement "sous peu". C'est à se demander si on peut vraiment faire confiance à une créature aussi énigmatique. »
languages.original_text: "The xenos Muaran has taken his squad out of the forest and is making ready to enter the corrupted sector. He requests aid and promises that we will understand what is going on 'soon.' It is not clear whether we can trust such an enigmatic creature."

traits.locale_text: « Le xénos Muaran et son escouade ont quitté la forêt et se préparent à pénétrer dans le secteur corrompu. Il a demandé qu'on leur envoie de l'aide et a promis que la nature des événements nous apparaîtrait clairement "sous peu". C'est à se demander si on peut vraiment faire confiance à une créature aussi énigmatique. »

languages.text: "Der Xenos Muaran hat seinen Trupp aus dem Wald geführt und macht sich bereit, den verderbten Sektor zu betreten. Er erbittet Hilfe und verspricht, dass wir 'bald' verstehen werden, was vor sich geht. Es ist nicht klar, ob wir einer so rätselhaften Kreatur vertrauen können."
languages.original_text: "The xenos Muaran has taken his squad out of the forest and is making ready to enter the corrupted sector. He requests aid and promises that we will understand what is going on 'soon.' It is not clear whether we can trust such an enigmatic creature."

traits.locale_text: "Der Xenos Muaran hat seinen Trupp aus dem Wald geführt und macht sich bereit, den verderbten Sektor zu betreten. Er erbittet Hilfe und verspricht, dass wir 'bald' verstehen werden, was vor sich geht. Es ist nicht klar, ob wir einer so rätselhaften Kreatur vertrauen können."

"Der Xenos Muaran hat seinen Trupp aus dem Wald geführt und macht sich bereit, den entweihten Sektor zu betreten. Er erbittet Hilfe und verspricht, dass wir 'bald' verstehen werden, was vor sich geht. Es ist nicht klar, ob wir einer solch rätselhaften Kreatur vertrauen können."

languages.text: "Zeno Muaran, mangasını ormandan çıkardı ve şimdi yozlaşmış sektöre girmeye hazırlanıyor. Yardım talep ediyor ve 'çok yakında' neler olduğunu anlayacağımızı vadediyor. Böylesine muammalı bir yaratığa itimat edip edemeyeceğimiz belirsizliğini koruyor."
languages.original_text: "The xenos Muaran has taken his squad out of the forest and is making ready to enter the corrupted sector. He requests aid and promises that we will understand what is going on 'soon.' It is not clear whether we can trust such an enigmatic creature."

traits.locale_text: "Zeno Muaran, mangasını ormandan çıkardı ve şimdi yozlaşmış sektöre girmeye hazırlanıyor. Yardım talep ediyor ve 'çok yakında' neler olduğunu anlayacağımızı vadediyor. Böylesine muammalı bir yaratığa itimat edip edemeyeceğimiz belirsizliğini koruyor."
